content:
* No delete operation is performed; instead, `status`(see Mapping for details) is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |dateTime|`schedops.LEG_TIMES`|`OFFBLOCK_DT`,
`LANDING_DT`,
`ONBLOCK_DT`,
`ACARS_INIT_DT`,
`ACARS_DOORS_CLOSED_DT`,
`MVT_AFTER_PUSHBACK_DT`,
`ACARS_DOORS_OPENED_DT`,
`ACARS_ENGINE_START_DT`|
  • when `type` = “Offblock“ then `OFFBLOCK_DT`
  • when `type` = “Airborne“ then `AIRBORNE_DT`
  • when `type` = “Landing“ then `LANDING_DT`
  • when `type` = “Onblock“ then `ONBLOCK_DT`
  • when `type` = “INIT“ then `ACARS_INIT_DT`
  • when `type` = “DoorsClosed“ then `ACARS_DOORS_CLOSED_DT`
  • when `type` = “MVTAfterPushback“ then `MVT_AFTER_PUSHBACK_DT`
  • when `type` = “DoorsOpened“ then `ACARS_DOORS_OPENED_DT`
  • when `type` = “EngineStart“ then `ACARS_ENGINE_START_DT`
| |legId|`schedops.LEG_TIMES`|`LEG_NO`| | |source|`schedops.LEG_TIMES`|`usage`|
  • when `schedops.LEG_TIMES.usage` = “A“ then “NA“
  • when `schedops.LEG_TIMES.usage` = “F“ then “NF”
  • when `schedops.LEG_TIMES.usage` = “M“ then “NM”
| |status|`schedops.LEG_TIMES`|`STATE`|
  • when `schedops.LEG_TIMES.STATE` = “NEW“ then “Active“
  •  when `schedops.LEG_TIMES.STATE` = “DEL“ then “Deleted”
| |type| | |The field is set to one of the following values in the query.
  • “Offblock” 
  • “Airborne” 
  • “Landing” 
  • “Onblock”
  •  “INIT”
  •  “DoorsClosed” 
  • “MVTAfterPushback” 
  • “DoorsOpened” 
  • “EngineStart“
| # Flight Crew Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Retrieve newly published events from the rele
